bike.description: Specialized E5 AEROTEC, fully manipulated tubing, compact race geometry, FACT carbon seatstays with Zertz inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT monocoque carbon fork legs, crown, and steerer with Zertz inserts
Specialized Mindset Plus, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, sealed stainless steel cartridge bearings, carbon 20mm cone with two 5mm alloy spacers
S-Works FACT carbon stem, magnesium face plate, 31.8mm clamp
S-Works FACT carbon aero handlebar, racing drop, ergo/aero shaping, 31.8mm clamp
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon w/2.5mm gel padding
Shimano Dura-Ace, 10-speed, STI, flight deck compatible
Shimano Dura-Ace, 10-speed, STI, flight deck compatible
Shimano Dura-Ace, double crankset, Hollowtech II 2-piece design
Shimano Dura-Ace, sleeve-joint and machined aluminum rim, silver
Shimano Dura-Ace, 20 hole, aluminum freehub body, Shimano QR
Body Geometry Alias, carbon reinfoced base, hollow titanium rails, microfiber cover
Specialized Pavé FACT carbon seatpost with Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, reflectors, chain catcher, clear coat, owners manual
